title: Sweet Sweet Karma... (Not the champion)

replies.body:
-plays supp
-gets carried 
-bms like actually did something worthwhile
-wins 
-bms some more
-gets on forums with stupid story hoping someone will massage that huge ego.

Nice

Obviously low elo to assume such nonsense, a support influences the game almost just as much as any other role. & they lack the respect & acknowledgement that they deserve

You probably base your opinion on afk supports like lulu/janna/soraka who rely on a decent AD to do damage. - Supports such as blitz/thresh/rakan don't really need a good ad, they make plays themselves and can peel just as well.

I have seen a lategame draven get 1v1'd by a janna. Don't assume Janna doesn't do damage, you're a poor mans kayle once you have athene's, but if you assume janna can't kill you, you'll be getting mocked by your team in no time.

he was either oom, dropped his axes, bad build  or  she had an op build.

definitely happened in bronze though lol
And apparently I'm the toxic guy here

Was deleted before i managed to see it :( wp moddos. Mfw his posts get deleted but you calling people offensive names stays. 

Its amazing youre not banned
What are you talking about? Nothing I've posted recently has been deleted.
Thought you were calling someone else toxic? I got a notification someone replied to one of my messages but it was deleted.

depends, support isn't always about being carried, for instance, if you think just cause you're toplane you can 1v1 my naut support you're going to find your head planted in the ground and an anchor sticking up from your ass.

or the many times, when cancer supports like brand, zyra and malzaids, end up being higher priority targets for assassins than the midlaner, because they somehow do more damage than the rest of their team combined.

also if you ever lose a 1v1 to a janna as a full build draven then the question mark in all chat is necessary.
still no respect for toxic players like this guy though, failing a flash is funny, stop throwing a tantrum.
Imo predicting the game outcome & putting a bmer in their place is funny to me. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

i guess, depending on how you interpret it, but I feel you probably didn't need to respond to bm and flame with more bm.

It just escalates the issue, risks getting a ban, and doesn't really make you seem any more mature. Do you really want to be considered the same by the community as that guy who added you only to be an ass?

Well played!

Be careful out there on the rift as a wise rioter once told me 'don't fight fire with fire'. 

You could end up getting banned/reported for being toxic.

Not sure if you can get banned for saying "nice loss"? 
i mean i've said ggez and been chat restricted before but surely nice loss isnt so bad
You're both trying to piss each other off. Same type, different view.
So pretty much you're both being assholes to each other and you're having a laugh here by showing it off on the boards thinking he's the idiot? Both of you should of gotten reported for toxicity imo
I think you've missed the point, point was someone tried to bm, it backfired and they couldn't handle this hotness - 2 hot
